lines.text: Well, there goes the last of our practical jokes, chum. Are you sure we're doing the right thing?

A resolution is a resolution, old feather-head. Listen to this. "We hereby resolve that as of this moment throughout the New Year we will abstain from all forms of practical jokes, gags, etc." Heckle, my dear ex-joker, sign here.
Oh, well. It was a good try, wasn't it?
